long_description: The Pelican 0915 SD card case takes your memory storage to the limit! It offers serious protection for up to 12 SD cards, 6 miniSD cards and 6 microSD cards. Water-, dust- and crush-resistant design with removable liner cradles your memory cards to protect them from damage. Liner doubles as O-ring seal to help keep moisture and dust from getting inside. The Pelican 0915 SD card case features an easy-opening, lockable latch that releases the lid.
short_description: The Pelican 0915 SD card case takes your memory storage to the limit! It offers serious protection for up to 12 SD cards, 6 miniSD cards and 6 microSD cards.
